content: A lot of people pay for access to watch sports live, and that is good because they have huge operational costs, but some people can't afford this kind of service and prefer to find a live stream, or some others listen to the live narration of the sport on youtube or some others find a live stream on facebook.But I'm here to share the right way, or how I do it...First of all, you should install an ads block in your browser.Chrome: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/adblock-plus-free-ad-bloc/cfhdojbkjhnklbpkdaibdccddilifddb?hl=es-419Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/es/firefox/addon/adblock-plus/This is because these streaming sites love to spam with ads.The second step is to visit: http://www.rojadirecta.me/Then select the game:And then choose the best stream for you:This is a free service for the community, and if you appreciate it feel free to send a beer to my profile address. And I hope you enjoy the games. If you want to share a service like Rojadirecta with the best sports streams just let me know and I will make the list on this post.

comments.body: Quote from: seoincorporation on December 15, 2022, 12:39:47 AMIf you want to share a service like Rojadirecta with the best sports streams just let me know and I will make the list on this post.I won't get into legality of this service and I think we all know that people could get in trouble, so it's better to at least use some VPN for this website.Problem I have is that this Rojadirecta website doesn't have https certificate so nothing is encrypted when you visit this website.As for browser adblocker, there is much better open source alternative called uBlock Origin.
